item.title: About me
item.description: Who I am Full stack developer coding with web technologies like Laravel, Vue.js and Sql. Based in Reggio Emilia, Italy Nerdy on the inside I’m driven by curiosity, and the need to continuously learn new things. Currently, employed at Mow.it. Worked for Timeneye.com and Saleswith.it.
